This is an outstanding place to stay. The location is close to many things, and the house was very clean, and the host provided a lot of items as well as information about local sites. Highly recommend Brian’s home!
Cute two bedroom one bath place that has all of the basic necessities for your stay! It was very close to restaurants and shops. We would stay here again.

Brian’s duplex is spot on for cleanliness, location and convenience! A great spot for Scottsbluff visitors. We were visiting family and this unit was an excellent match for our needs. It is well stocked and Brian has some nice touches.

If we could give our stay 100 stars, we would!!! The home was in a great location. Grocery stores and restaurants were close by and very accessible. Beds were comfy and the home immaculate. The neighborhood was quiet and friendly. We will definitely come back!

This place was so cute! Great quiet neighborhood. The skate park was a block away, which was perfect for my boys. The kitchen was fully stocked with dishes, pots and pans, spices, toaster, blender and a crock pot.

The perfect place to stay in Scottsbluff! The house was super cute! Beds were so comfy. It has everything you need! Can’t wait to come back and stay again!

Really nice home Margaret really nice person
Perfect little house, perfect location loved our stay! Highly recommend quiet neighborhood!!

Thanks, Margaret!

This tiny home was exactly as advertised. It wasn’t anything extravagant but had everything we needed. The bed was super comfortable, and the whole place was clean. Margaret was helpful in contacting us ahead of time to ensure we knew where we were going and how to get in.
Cute super clean home. Friendly and helpful host.
Beautiful, cutest place, thank you for providing such good keurig coffee, and I loved Kevin and Mary the neighborhood pups.
Margarets place felt right at home me and my boyfriend loved it. I wish we could of stayed longer . love everything about scottsbluff thank you Margaret for shating your cute home.
The nicely furnished quiet safe space was just what I was looking for. Margaret was so willing to help with any of my needs and requests. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay. Thank you.
Great Airbnb.

I loved staying in this tiny home. It felt spacious and is a beautiful space. Margaret is very welcoming; she reached out to make sure everything was going well and was just a very nice person. I would absolutely stay here again!

Margaret is the first Air BnB host that has ever inspired me to leave a “thank you” card after our stay. She was incredibly sweet and generous during our stay even ushering us into her basement while multiple tornadoes touched down around Scottsbluff. 10/10 would absolutely stay here again.
Margaret's tiny house was comfortable and clean with bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and living room. I especially enjoyed the garden which could be seen from the kitchen table.

Margaret was very accommodating, when we needed to change our arrival date last minute. She also had a great suggestion for a free concert in the square downtown, which happened to be walking distance from our airbnb. I would refer this clean little home for anyone visiting the panhandle area.
Perfect for what we needed

Thank you!

The place is decorated tastefully modern and is comfortable. No clutter, and kitchen is super cute. Peaceful landscaping out front to make our stay more homey! Great place for the money.

Quiet, quaint and a comfortable stay! Cute neighborhood. I had everything I needed, the bed was comfortable, the kitchen had essentials needed! Margaret was friendly and available, would recommend staying here if visiting the area. Thank you again Margaret!
The description fit the house well and is within a short walk to broadway/downtown. This is a perfect stay for a couple or a solo traveler.

The home was spotless and had everything we needed. The hot tub was a huge bonus after traveling for several hours. We booked at the last second and the host was quick to respond. We will try and book this home in the future because we expect to frequent the area!
perfect place for our periple

This is a phenomenal place to stay. Very clean, free of clutter. Great furniture, appliances etc. The hot tub was a huge plus. HIGHLY recommend this place. The snack basket was an added bonus. Thank you Doug!

Doug’s house was an awesome place to stay! We enjoyed every part of it from the grill, to the hot tub, to the large screen TV, and all of the amenities. He was really easy to communicate with and very thoughtful. Would totally recommend this place to stay for anyone looking in Scottsbluff! It was very well furnished and had everything we needed. Whenever we’re back in town we’ll definitely be coming back! 100% recommend to all!

This is a BEAUTIFUL home. Perfectly staged with adorable yet useful decor! We loved having separate rooms for everyone, and the kitchen had everything we needed. We used the hot tub multiple times, and the fire pit made for a nice relaxing evening while my husband grilled steaks. We would DEFINITELY recommend staying here, my family hopes to stay again during future visits.
Great place

This is a very efficient space very well situated close to downtown and the local Walmart just five minutes away., it’s a residential area with light traffics during the day, wry quiet at night. The house is compact and well thought out with new appliances quality furnishings with tasteful little details. During my stay there was a nice Christmas tree set in the corner of the living room! Parking is off road and the house has very good security features. The yard has a nice fire pit and hot tub within a private fenced area. The owner was very responsive and friendly. Would I stay here again or recommend to my own friends? Absolutely! It’s good value, very clean and in a convenient location.
Really nice place, super clean, hot tub was nice! Will be my go-to spot whenever I come back to Scottsbluff

This was such a lovely little bungalow! This house had everything you need in an Airbnb. Doug was very responsive and easy to communicate with. We will definitely stay here again if we pass through Scottsbluff on the way home.
This place was perfect for my family. We all felt right at home and the bonus of Christmas decorations made the stay extra cozy. Thanks Doug.
Such a cute place! The hot tub hit the spot!
What a beautiful home! Doug was very responsive and accommodating. Definitely recommend!
Absolutely loved this place. So clean and easy check in!

Doug’s place was super clean and perfect for a weekend trip to Scottsbluff! The kitchen was fully stocked with any cooking utensil you would need and I appreciated all the small touches that made you feel at home. Would highly recommend if you are looking for a place to stay in Scottsbluff!
Felt comfortable and at home the moment we opened the door. Nice and quiet neighborhood. Home was clean and cozy.
Beautiful home, nice neighborhood! Hot tub and fire pit are a great touch. Perfect place to stay while I was in town for a couple days at a conference

Doug and Kayla were absolutely amazing to work with. We had some life changes recently and they went above and beyond in making accommodations for us, which we appreciated so much. It is so cozy and my spouse kept telling me he really loved how well maintained the property was. The hot tub was an AMAZING perk, especially since we were in town for the Monument Marathon. We highly recommend and will definitely stay again if we are in the area!!
House was perfect! Absolutely loved it. Doug was quick to respond and helpful.

We absolutely adore this little house. Doug did such a good job with all of his work on this property, inside and out. My husband is an electrician and my son's friend who was with us works in contracting and were very impressed with the work that was done on this place. Love the hot tub!!

We stayed here on the way back from Yellowstone and it was just what we needed. The hot tub and firepit were amazing. The house has been beautifully redone and was extremely clean. Doug was phenomenal to work with. So personable, responsive, and caring. We truly felt like we were taken care of. Would definitely stay here again! Thanks for your hospitality, Doug!

Doug's place was perfect for my trip to Western Nebraska. It was exactly as listed and had everything I needed for my stay. Doug was communicative and made sure I was comfortable. I will definitely stay again the next time I'm in the Scottsbluff area!

Doug and his home were amazing! My husband, in laws, and I came to the area for a wedding. The guest book comes with tons of suggestions of things to do and places to eat. The hot tub was so nice! Doug went above and beyond, had the nicest grill & gave us an awesome recommendation as to where to get some great quality steaks. Also, he left his person seasoning for us to try which was also great! He came over to change a battery in a smoke alarm and we had a great conversation. All in all we had an over the top experience and would recommend to anyone coming to the area looking for a beautiful home & amazing host!!
Everything we could have hoped for and more. Will definitely be staying here again!
Clean and clean comfortable. Can’t ask for much more!

Great place to stay in scottsbluff! House is perfectly clean, beds are very comfortable and the hot tube after a day walking outdoor is a great pleasure! Do not hesitate, stay here!
Superior in all aspects, both inside and out. Doug was a fantastic host...friendly, responsive, willing to go the extra mile.

What a cute little house. It definitely looks like the house was totally remodeled and done nicely. The outside yard area also looks good, well taken care of. The kitchen is supplied with paper products, spices, etc. And in the bathroom, he supplied shampoos, conditioner and body washes. Doug put in very nice appliances in the kitchen and laundry. We enjoy our stay. The countryside surrounding Scottsbluff is beautiful. It definitely doesn't look like the Nebraska I am familiar with. Thanks Doug for sharing this house with us.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at this most exceptional Airbnb, and I can confidently say it was one of the best travel experiences I've ever had. From the moment I stepped through the door, I was greeted with a sense of warmth and comfort that made me feel right at home.
Cleanliness is paramount to me, and this Airbnb surpassed all my expectations. The entire space was immaculate, with a fresh scent that permeated the air. Every corner was spotless, with attention given to even the tiniest details. It truly felt like the hosts had gone above and beyond to ensure a pristine environment for their guests.
Upon entering, the cozy ambiance enveloped me. The thoughtful decor choices, such as warm hues and tasteful artwork, created an inviting atmosphere that instantly put me at ease. The living area was tastefully furnished with plush sofas, making it a perfect spot to unwind after a long day. They hottub and fire pit were the cherry on top after a long day spent traveling.
Doug’s place was perfect! Very clean everything you needed. Appreciated the lighting outside. The landscaping was impeccable! Definitely would stay again!
Great place!! Well kept and very clean and comfortable!!
Quiet neighborhood, excellent clean accommodations. Relaxing place to stay. Doug was very quick to answer a couple questions I had on logistics at start of stay. We would 100% stay here again.

A clean, secure space with great furniture, a great bathroom, and modern amenities across the board. Not far from the downtown, but far enough away in a nice, quiet neighborhood. Doug was very responsive with some issues I was having with the locks on the door. But it was an issue of too much security, NOT too little. An OK bump in the road to have. We got it solved within minutes.
Will stay again for sure! Thank you!

My husband and I stopped here on our way home to Kansas and this is probably the nicest AirBnB we’ve ever stayed in! Very well kept, easy to find + access and super responsive host! If we’re ever in the area again, we would absolutely stay here and enjoy the hot tub and town more!

This is my families favorite home we have stayed at so far ! Doug was great , very responsive! They have tons of amenities. The grill was perfect for family dinner and the hot tub was heavenly! They even provided toys for my kids to play with . We will be visiting again .

Doug’s Place felt right at home! So cozy, very accommodating! Beautiful house, the pictures don’t do justice! Will be our first pick every-time we go to visit! Had the pleasure to meet the hosts in person, so nice! Thank you so much for the hospitality!
Beautiful house , very clean and cozy! Will def look to bill this place again if I’m back in the area .

our second stay. we enjoyed it and hope to stay again! The home is so cute and spotless!

He was so appreciative and willing to listen so he can improve his home for future guests. The home was so clean, and cozy. Loved the fire put and hot tub but also the gas range in the kitchen! Well worth the price and location for this Airbnb home.

Nice aesthetic. Very clean. Spices well stocked and several ‘above and beyond’ services. Only surprise was no table or extra chairs to sit at. There were trays to use while you sat on the couch, but the furniture and rug were in such good condition that it made me nervous to have my kids eating on the couch. Would be fine for adults. Overall, a fabulous place, responsive host and peaceful neighborhood. Wish we could have stayed longer.

Well if I could give a 10 I would. We are traveling nurses. Nicest place I’ve ever stay. Everything was just as pictured but even better. New extremely clean and most of all felt safe. Doug and Kayla are are two of best host you well ever find. Friendly and on top of thing for anything you could need. We have made 2 lifelong friends.
really good place. recommended for every one

Very solid upgrades and not just cosmetics. They really made this home a nice place and did it right! I will stay there again anytime I'm in town!
Great experience.
we had a great stay! Doug was responsive and helpful. The house was spotless and beautiful! We also enjoyed the hot tub! We look forward to staying again!

The kitchen and bath are modern and come stocked with every item you could possibly need. The bedrooms are comfortable and quiet. The house is safe, warm, and inviting and is perfectly located to get to anything in the area. The internet is very fast and reliable - I was able to work remotely with no blips or errors. The hot tub is fantastic. Doug, our host, was very friendly and communicative but respected our privacy. Doug responded right away if there was something we needed. Overall, we had a wonderful stay and would definitely come back.

Everything has been thought of, way beyond expectations in the kitchen and bathroom. Bathroom vanity is a bit tight but well lit. Host really has thought of everything a guest could need.
Very cozy place in cool location. Very quiet despite it being on Broadway. Walk just a few feet to catch a movie at the charm and historic Midwest theater or grab a latte at cappuccino & Co.

It was beyond clean and great location. Very unique and original. Easy instructions for the large tv. Nice touch! Comfy bed and easy walking distance everywhere. I will definitely stay here more often and I definitely recommend!
Great private place. Clean. Loved the coffee maker! Everything I needed was ready and available. I had a problem with the code lock but they had it fixed within a few minutes. Great communication!
Incredibly nice hosts and a beautiful apartment conveniently located to everything!

Fantastic stay again!

Everything about the apartment was easy and cozy!
